author: Rob Braxman Tech
description:
There is a cyber attack that is one of the hardest to defend against. I call it the side channel attack. It is extremely hard to protect against because it is an attack on people you know. The end target is you but the approach is via side channel. This is a method used by doxxers and Intelligence agencies and is made easy by your presence on social media.

title: The Side Channel Attack: One of the Hardest Cyber Threats to Defend Against
